description.ko: 첨단 기술과 도시 지하 세계의 거친 현실이 공존하는 미래형 대도시의 전율적인 박동에 몰입해 보세요. 크롬의 반사광, 네온의 광채, 그리고 무한한 디지털 그림자로 정의되는 세계입니다.
description.en: Immerse yourself in the electric pulse of a futuristic metropolis where high-tech advancements meet the gritty reality of the urban underground. A world defined by chrome reflections, neon glows, and infinite digital shadows.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a sprawling cyberpunk megacity at night, rain-slicked asphalt reflecting vibrant neon signs in cyan and magenta, towering skyscrapers with massive holographic advertisements, flying vehicles leaving light trails through the dense fog, hyper-detailed architecture, 8k resolution, futuristic noir aesthetic, high contrast lighting.
